sentences.sContent: In some ways, clean code -- like beauty -- is in the eye of the beholder.
sentences.sContent_eng: In some ways, clean code -- like beauty -- is in the eye of the beholder.
sentences.sCn: 在一定程度上，干净的代码——像漂亮一样——就是在旁观者眼中所留下的印象。

sentences.sContent: But the lesson stuck with me -- "extensible" is in the eye of the beholder.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the lesson stuck with me -- "extensible" is in the eye of the beholder.
sentences.sCn: 但我得到了经验 —— “可扩展的”是在旁观者的眼中的。

trans.tranOther: The beholder of something is the person who is looking at it
